channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These prebuilt PCs are about to cost more due to rising RAM prices
item.description: The skyrocketing price of RAM is trickling down to custom PC makers, including CyberPowerPC and Maingear. On Wednesday, CyberPowerPC announced that it plans to adjust the pricing across all of its systems on December 7th, as reported earlier by PCMag. “Recently, global memory (RAM) prices have surged by 500% and SSD prices have risen by […]

item.title: Everything we know about the looming DJI drone ban in the United States
item.description: DJI drones are very likely to be banned in the United States by December 2025. Get the latest updates from DJI.

item.title: Save up to $350 on some of our top-scoring office furniture from Vari this Black Friday
item.description: Vari always scores highly in our reviews thanks to their simple designs and solid build quality, and for Black Friday they're getting discounts you won't want to miss

item.title: 60 best gifts for men: Awesome, unique gift ideas for impossible-to-shop-for guys
item.description: Whether he likes camping, the latest tech, comfy athleisure, or Legos, we've got gift ideas for men he's sure to love.

item.title: How the ‘Sinners’ Costume Designer Helped Wunmi Mosaku Shape the Movie’s Secret MVP
item.description: The actress sat down with the legendary Ruth E. Carter to discuss how they both found Annie's story in costuming.

item.title: 14 Early Black Friday Deals at Best Buy (2025)
item.description: The main event hasn’t started, but Best Buy has already rolled out great deals on our favorite tech of the year.

item.title: Sam Altman wants his AI device to feel like 'sitting in the most beautiful cabin by a lake,' but it sounds more like endless surveillance
item.description: OpenAI's new device promises serenity, but its always-on surveillance will make it anything but peaceful to own.

item.title: Save $1,000 on the LG 65-inch G5 OLED 4K TV at Amazon — score the best-ever price for Black Friday
item.description: Get the best TV deal in Black Friday 2025. The LG 65-inch G5 OLED 4K TV is on sale for $1,996.99 in the Amazon Black Friday sale.

item.title: Earthquakes Did Something Unexpected to Life Deep Beneath Yellowstone
item.description: Researchers took a look at how earthquakes change what's available on the underground microbial menu.

item.title: On a créé l’outil qui tue les fausses promos du Black Friday
item.description: Le Black Friday arrive et avec lui, son lot de fausses promotions et de produits douteux. On a décidé d'agir. Voici Frandroid Check, notre extension navigateur maison. L'extension s'affiche directement sur les sites marchands pour vous donner le test du produit et son vrai prix. C'est gratuit, et ça change tout.

item.title: The 63 best gifts for moms — Holiday gift ideas worthy of a great woman
item.description: The best gifts for moms, including non-cliché gift ideas she'll love for Mother's Day, Christmas, or her birthday.

item.title: Did Intel's next big thing in workstations just leak? Ahead of Granite Rapids launch, report claims this is what's next from troubled chipmaker
item.description: Intel’s next HEDT workstation platform supports high-end memory, multiple PCIe lanes, and robust connectivity, challenging AMD’s Threadripper ecosystem.

item.title: Pretty much every pair of Loop earplugs are on sale for Black Friday
item.description: Loop's entire earplug line is on sale for Black Friday — save on the everything from the concert-ready Loop Experience 2 to the sleep-assisting Loop Dream earplugs.

item.title: Can Starlink be blocked? Scary Chinese simulation shows 1,000 drones can jam satellite internet over an island as large as Taiwan
item.description: A Chinese study shows that Starlink could be totally blocked out over a large island by a swarm of drones.

item.title: Darty brade ce PC Acer avec RTX 5060 : offre limitée Black Friday
item.description: C'est probablement le PC gamer le plus rentable du moment en termes de puissance pure. Si vous cherchez une station de jeu mobile efficace et abordable pour le Black Friday, regardez cette offre de près.

item.title: C’est le roi des 14 pouces : l’Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 avec RTX 5070 devient (enfin) accessible
item.description: Trouver un PC portable qui tient dans un petit sac à dos mais capable de faire tourner Cyberpunk 2077 à fond, c'est la quête impossible. Sauf quand Darty décide de casser le prix du meilleur 14 pouces du marché.

item.title: Congress Calls Anthropic CEO to Testify About AI Cyberattack Allegedly From China
item.description: "We believe this is the first documented case of a large-scale cyberattack executed without substantial human intervention," Anthropic said earlier this month.

item.title: Stockage Switch et Steam Deck : grosse chute de prix sur la microSDXC SanDisk Ultra de 1 To
item.description: Vous passez votre temps à désinstaller des jeux sur votre console portable ? Arrêtez tout. SanDisk casse le prix de sa carte la plus massive, et c'est le moment idéal pour étendre votre stockage.

item.title: My number one office chair gets a discount of almost $100 - and not even Amazon can beat that for Black Friday
item.description: The Branch Verve is my top-rated office chair, and not even Amazon can match the low price for it in this Black Friday deal.

item.title: The best Black Friday MacBook deals live right now: Record-low prices on MacBook Air and MacBook Pro with M5 chip
item.description: MacBook deals are holding strong as Black Friday sales officially kick off. So far, our favorite finds are from Best Buy and Amazon.

item.title: The ‘Mighty Nein’ Creators Wanted to Make a ‘Darker, More Impactful’ Show
item.description: When it came to 'The Mighty Nein,' the Critical Role team wanted to adapt the live show and get its hands dirty in the process.

item.title: Nordic founders are taking bigger swings, and it’s paying off
item.description: Ten years ago, raising €1 million in Copenhagen was enough to make waves in the region’s tech scene. Today, the Nordics are turning out billion-dollar companies like Lovable — which hit $200M in revenue just 12 months after launching. Dennis Green-Lieber, founder of AI-powered customer intelligence platform Propane, has had a front-row seat to that shift over the […]...

item.title: MIT study finds AI is already capable of replacing 11.7% of U.S. workers
item.description: The study finds routine roles in HR, logistics and finance face more disruption than previously forecast. A new study from MIT that shows that AI might be poised to replace a lot more jobs than what initial estimates might predict. According to researchers, a hidden mass of data reveals that AI is currently capable of taking over 11.7% of the labor market....

item.title: Pourquoi cette offre sur le monstre de Dyson vaut vraiment le détour
item.description: Vous cherchiez une excuse pour remplacer votre vieil aspirateur poussif ? Le Gen5detect, véritable monstre de puissance, voit enfin son prix dégringoler sous la barre symbolique des 550 euros grâce à un cumul d'offres.

item.title: Here are the 49 US AI startups that have raised $100M or more in 2025
item.description: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

item.title: Campbell’s fired the VP recorded saying its meat ‘came from a 3D printer’
item.description: Campbell’s says it fired its vice president of information technology after leaked audio allegedly captured him saying the company uses meat that “came from a 3D printer.” The comments led Campbell’s to issue an explanation on its website, insisting its soups aren’t made with 3D-printed chicken, lab-grown chicken, or bioengineered meat. “A recent video contained […]...

item.title: Everything to know about Walmart Black Friday 2025: Early access, best deals, ad highlights
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about Walmart's Black Friday sale, including when the sale starts and ends, what time stores open, and the best early deals to shop.

item.title: ‘Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance’ May Be Dead, but Its Props Commanded Top Dollar
item.description: A recent auction brought in nearly $3 million thanks to collectors hungry for Gelfling puppets and other Jim Henson Company treasures.

item.title: Save $900 on Sony’s Best Mirrorless Camera With This Early Black Friday Deal (2025)
item.description: Sony’s top-of-the-line A7R V mirrorless camera is at the lowest price it’s ever been, and so is the more video-friendly A7 IV.
